rComments: Kelton is an awesome professor!! He isn't teaching most of the time, instead doing research, which means he's up-to-date on the field! He's so enthusiastic about the topics and he genuinely enjoys teaching and helping! He's as much of a nerd about nudibranches as I am and he was really understanding when i had a meeting with him. Cute, smart, fun!

I loved having Kelton as a professor. He's extremely passionate about what he teaches and is really funny. He also posts all of his power points online, but it helps to be their for lectures to hear his dialogue. Plus he's cute!!!!

I'm majoring in marine bio so this guy was the coolest! he's traveled the world tracking animals so he knows what he's talking about. he's funny, cool, and very cute (ahem ladies). his tests and assignments were tough as graded by TAs and there was a good amount of math involved too

not really an easy GE class but still super interesting and fun. kelton is a cool young dude so he knows how to make his lectures good. homework packets are due weekly and can be graded tough depending on TA. exams are 40 questions so they're not too bad. I had a great time in his class and he's pretty hot and funny
